name: Of Mice and Mech
description:
Suggested soundtrack: 'Of Mice and Mech' by Soundole

There's a crack on one of this mech's toes, which appears to have been widened recently by gnawing teeth. You scurry inside...

'Of Mice and Mech' is a short (~5 minutes) is a short journey from the perspective of a mouse, produced for the Mech Bitsy Jam. Use arrow keys to move, and to advance dialogue (swipe to move on mobile platforms). 

Credits:

Peter Smith (Soundole) and Erin Moss
